blocks.name: bwth
blocks.content: The glorious Bolzano-Weierstrass theorem. The first general topology theorem ever proved. The first mention of this theorem can be found in a course by Weierstrass from 1865. In his course Weierstrass called it a lemma. He didn't know how famous this theorem would be. He used a Euclidean space instead of a general compact space. And he was not aware of the Heine-Borel property. But the concepts of neighborhood and limit point were already there although not precisely defined. Cantor was one of his students. He published and used the theorem in an article from 1872. The rest of the general topology followed from that. (Contributed by FL, 2-Aug-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2013.) Revised by BL to significantly shorten the proof and avoid infinity, regularity, and choice. (Revised by Brendan Leahy, 26-Dec-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm bwth(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ccmp), wss(c1, c2), wn(wcel(c1, cfn))), wrex(s0, c2, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1))))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  mt3i(w3a(wcel(c0, ccmp), wss(c1, c2), wn(wcel(c1, cfn))), wrex(s0, c2, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1))), wrex(hs1, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), wa(wral(hs0, cv(hs1), wcel(cin(c1, cv(hs0)), cfn)), wrex(hs0, cv(hs1), wn(wcel(cin(c1, cv(hs0)), cfn))))))
  nrex(hs1, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), wa(wral(hs0, cv(hs1), wcel(cin(c1, cv(hs0)), cfn)), wrex(hs0, cv(hs1), wn(wcel(cin(c1, cv(hs0)), cfn)))))
  a1i(wcel(cv(hs1), cin(cpw(c0), cfn)), wn(wa(wral(hs0, cv(hs1), wcel(cin(c1, cv(hs0)), cfn)), wrex(hs0, cv(hs1), wn(wcel(cin(c1, cv(hs0)), cfn))))))
  mto(wa(wral(hs0, cv(hs1), wcel(cin(c1, cv(hs0)), cfn)), wrex(hs0, cv(hs1), wn(wcel(cin(c1, cv(hs0)), cfn)))), wrex(hs0, cv(hs1), wa(wcel(cin(c1, cv(hs0)), cfn), wn(wcel(cin(c1, cv(hs0)), cfn)))))
  nrex(hs0, cv(hs1), wa(wcel(cin(c1, cv(hs0)), cfn), wn(wcel(cin(c1, cv(hs0)), cfn))))
  a1i(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wn(wa(wcel(cin(c1, cv(hs0)), cfn), wn(wcel(cin(c1, cv(hs0)), cfn)))))
  pm3.24(wcel(cin(c1, cv(hs0)), cfn))
  r19.29(hs0, cv(hs1), wcel(cin(c1, cv(hs0)), cfn), wn(wcel(cin(c1, cv(hs0)), cfn)))
  syld(w3a(wcel(c0, ccmp), wss(c1, c2), wn(wcel(c1, cfn))), wn(wrex(s0, c2, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1)))), wrex(hs1, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), wa(wral(hs0, cv(hs1), wcel(cin(c1, cv(hs0)), cfn)), wrex(hs0, cv(hs1), wn(wcel(cin(c1, cv(hs0)), cfn))))), wrex(hs1, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), wa(wceq(c2, cuni(cv(hs1))), wral(hs0, cv(hs1), wex(hs2, wceq(cin(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs2)))), emptycls))))))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, ccmp), wss(c1, c2), wn(wcel(c1, cfn)), wi(wn(wrex(s0, c2, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1)))), wrex(hs1, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), wa(wceq(c2, cuni(cv(hs1))), wral(hs0, cv(hs1), wex(hs2, wceq(cin(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs2)))), emptycls)))))))
  sylbid(wa(wcel(c0, ccmp), wss(c1, c2)), wn(wrex(s0, c2, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1)))), wrex(hs1, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), wa(wceq(c2, cuni(cv(hs1))), wral(hs0, cv(hs1), wex(hs2, wceq(cin(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs2)))), emptycls))))), wral(s0, c2, wn(wral(hs0, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wne(cin(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0)))), emptycls))))))
  syl5bbr(wa(wcel(c0, ccmp), wss(c1, c2)), wn(wrex(s0, c2, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1)))), wral(s0, c2, wn(wral(hs0, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wne(cin(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0)))), emptycls))))), wral(s0, c2, wn(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1)))))
  ralnex(s0, c2, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1)))
  sylan(wcel(c0, ccmp), wss(c1, c2), wb(wral(s0, c2, wn(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1)))), wral(s0, c2, wn(wral(hs0, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wne(cin(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0)))), emptycls)))))), wcel(c0, ctop))
  cmptop(c0)
  ralbidva(s0, c2, wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2)), wn(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1))), wn(wral(hs0, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wne(cin(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0)))), emptycls)))))
  notbid(wa(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1)), wral(hs0, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wne(cin(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0)))), emptycls))))
  3expa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wb(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1)), wral(hs0, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wne(cin(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0)))), emptycls)))))
  islp3(hs0, c0, c1, c2, cv(s0))
  adantr(wcel(c0, ccmp), wss(c1, c2), wi(wral(s0, c2, wn(wral(hs0, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wne(cin(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0)))), emptycls))))), wrex(hs1, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), wa(wceq(c2, cuni(cv(hs1))), wral(hs0, cv(hs1), wex(hs2, wceq(cin(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs2)))), emptycls)))))))
  syl5(wcel(c0, ccmp), wral(s0, c2, wn(wral(hs0, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wne(cin(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0)))), emptycls))))), wrex(hs1, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), wa(wceq(c2, cuni(cv(hs1))), wral(hs0, cv(hs1), wex(hs2, wceq(cin(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs2)))), emptycls))))), wral(s0, c2, wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wex(hs2, wceq(cin(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs2)))), emptycls))))))
  ralimi(s0, c2, wn(wral(hs0, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wne(cin(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0)))), emptycls)))), wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wex(hs2, wceq(cin(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs2)))), emptycls)))))
  sylbir(wn(wral(hs0, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wne(cin(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0)))), emptycls)))), wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wex(hs2, wceq(cin(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs2)))), emptycls)))), wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wn(wne(cin(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0)))), emptycls)))))
  rexanali(hs0, c0, wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wne(cin(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0)))), emptycls))
  reximi(hs0, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wn(wne(cin(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0)))), emptycls))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wex(hs2, wceq(cin(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs2)))), emptycls))))
  anim2i(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wn(wne(cin(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0)))), emptycls)), wex(hs2, wceq(cin(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs2)))), emptycls)))
  sylbi(wn(wne(cin(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0)))), emptycls)), wex(hs2, wceq(cin(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs2)))), emptycls)), wceq(cin(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0)))), emptycls))
  nne(cin(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0)))), emptycls)
  spcev(hs2, cv(s0), wceq(cin(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0)))), emptycls), wceq(cin(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs2)))), emptycls))
  vex(s0)
  eqeq1d(cin(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs2)))), emptycls, cin(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0)))), wceq(cv(hs2), cv(s0)))

  expl(wa(wa(wss(c1, c2), wn(wcel(c1, cfn))), wcel(cv(hs1), cin(cpw(c0), cfn))), wceq(c2, cuni(cv(hs1))), wral(hs0, cv(hs1), wex(hs2, wceq(cin(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs2)))), emptycls))), wa(wral(hs0, cv(hs1), wcel(cin(c1, cv(hs0)), cfn)), wrex(hs0, cv(hs1), wn(wcel(cin(c1, cv(hs0)), cfn)))))
  anim12ci(wa(wa(wa(wss(c1, c2), wn(wcel(c1, cfn))), wcel(cv(hs1), cin(cpw(c0), cfn))), wceq(c2, cuni(cv(hs1)))), wral(hs0, cv(hs1), wex(hs2, wceq(cin(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs2)))), emptycls))), wral(hs0, cv(hs1), wcel(cin(c1, cv(hs0)), cfn)), wrex(hs0, cv(hs1), wn(wcel(cin(c1, cv(hs0)), cfn))))
  sylanl2(wa(wss(c1, c2), wn(wcel(c1, cfn))), wcel(cv(hs1), cin(cpw(c0), cfn)), wceq(c2, cuni(cv(hs1))), wrex(hs0, cv(hs1), wn(wcel(cin(c1, cv(hs0)), cfn))), wcel(cv(hs1), cfn))
  elinel2(cv(hs1), cpw(c0), cfn)
  anassrs(wa(wss(c1, c2), wn(wcel(c1, cfn))), wcel(cv(hs1), cfn), wceq(c2, cuni(cv(hs1))), wrex(hs0, cv(hs1), wn(wcel(cin(c1, cv(hs0)), cfn))))
  an42s(wss(c1, c2), wn(wcel(c1, cfn)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfn), wceq(c2, cuni(cv(hs1))), wrex(hs0, cv(hs1), wn(wcel(cin(c1, cv(hs0)), cfn))))
  sylan(wa(wss(c1, c2), wceq(c2, cuni(cv(hs1)))), wa(wn(wcel(c1, cfn)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfn)), wrex(hs0, cv(hs1), wn(wcel(cin(c1, cv(hs0)), cfn))), wss(c1, cuni(cv(hs1))))
  biimpac(wss(c1, c2), wceq(c2, cuni(cv(hs1))), wss(c1, cuni(cv(hs1))))

  3expa(wn(wcel(c1, cfn)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfn), wss(c1, cuni(cv(hs1))), wrex(hs0, cv(hs1), wn(wcel(cin(c1, cv(hs0)), cfn))))

  sylancl(wceq(cin(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs2)))), emptycls), wcel(cun(cin(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs2)))), csn(cv(hs2))), cfn), wcel(cin(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs2)))), cfn), wcel(csn(cv(hs2)), cfn))
  mpbiri(wceq(cin(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs2)))), emptycls), wcel(cin(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs2)))), cfn), wcel(emptycls, cfn))
  0fin()
  eleq1(cin(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs2)))), emptycls, cfn)
  snfi(cv(hs2))

  mp2an(wss(cin(cv(hs0), c1), cin(cun(cv(hs0), csn(cv(hs2))), cun(cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs2))), csn(cv(hs2))))), wss(cv(hs0), cun(cv(hs0), csn(cv(hs2)))), wss(c1, cun(cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs2))), csn(cv(hs2)))))
  ssun1(cv(hs0), csn(cv(hs2)))

blocks.pretty:
thm bwth(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Comp ∧ c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ ¬ c1 ∈ Fin)→ ∃(s0 ∈ c2, s0 ∈((limPt ` c0)` c1)))
  ⊣ c2 = ⋃ c0
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  mt3i((c0 ∈ Comp ∧ c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ ¬ c1 ∈ Fin), ∃(s0 ∈ c2, s0 ∈((limPt ` c0)` c1)), ∃(hs1 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin),(∀(hs0 ∈ hs1,(c1 ⋂ hs0)∈ Fin)∧ ∃(hs0 ∈ hs1, ¬(c1 ⋂ hs0)∈ Fin))))
  nrex(hs1, (P(c0)⋂ Fin), (∀(hs0 ∈ hs1,(c1 ⋂ hs0)∈ Fin)∧ ∃(hs0 ∈ hs1, ¬(c1 ⋂ hs0)∈ Fin)))
  a1i(hs1 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin), ¬(∀(hs0 ∈ hs1,(c1 ⋂ hs0)∈ Fin)∧ ∃(hs0 ∈ hs1, ¬(c1 ⋂ hs0)∈ Fin)))
  mto((∀(hs0 ∈ hs1,(c1 ⋂ hs0)∈ Fin)∧ ∃(hs0 ∈ hs1, ¬(c1 ⋂ hs0)∈ Fin)), ∃(hs0 ∈ hs1,((c1 ⋂ hs0)∈ Fin ∧ ¬(c1 ⋂ hs0)∈ Fin)))
  nrex(hs0, hs1, ((c1 ⋂ hs0)∈ Fin ∧ ¬(c1 ⋂ hs0)∈ Fin))
  a1i(hs0 ∈ hs1, ¬((c1 ⋂ hs0)∈ Fin ∧ ¬(c1 ⋂ hs0)∈ Fin))
  pm3.24((c1 ⋂ hs0)∈ Fin)
  r19.29(hs0, hs1, (c1 ⋂ hs0)∈ Fin, ¬(c1 ⋂ hs0)∈ Fin)
  syld((c0 ∈ Comp ∧ c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ ¬ c1 ∈ Fin), ¬ ∃(s0 ∈ c2, s0 ∈((limPt ` c0)` c1)), ∃(hs1 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin),(∀(hs0 ∈ hs1,(c1 ⋂ hs0)∈ Fin)∧ ∃(hs0 ∈ hs1, ¬(c1 ⋂ hs0)∈ Fin))), ∃(hs1 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin),(c2 = ⋃ hs1 ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ hs1, ∃(hs2,(hs0 ⋂(c1 \ { hs2 }))= ∅)))))
  3adant3(c0 ∈ Comp, c1 ⊆ c2, ¬ c1 ∈ Fin, (¬ ∃(s0 ∈ c2, s0 ∈((limPt ` c0)` c1))→ ∃(hs1 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin),(c2 = ⋃ hs1 ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ hs1, ∃(hs2,(hs0 ⋂(c1 \ { hs2 }))= ∅))))))
  sylbid((c0 ∈ Comp ∧ c1 ⊆ c2), ¬ ∃(s0 ∈ c2, s0 ∈((limPt ` c0)` c1)), ∃(hs1 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin),(c2 = ⋃ hs1 ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ hs1, ∃(hs2,(hs0 ⋂(c1 \ { hs2 }))= ∅)))), ∀(s0 ∈ c2, ¬ ∀(hs0 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ hs0 →(hs0 ⋂(c1 \ { s0 }))≠ ∅))))
